/** * Utility class to contain version numbers in "Dewey Decimal" * syntax. Numbers in the "Dewey Decimal" syntax consist of positive * decimal integers separated by periods ".". For example, "2.0" or * "1.2.3.4.5.6.7". This allows an extensible number to be used to * represent major, minor, micro, etc versions. The version number * must begin with a number. * * Original Implementation moved to org.apache.tools.ant.util.DeweyDecimal * @deprecated use org.apache.tools.ant.util.DeweyDecimal instead. * Deprecated since ant 1.8 */
